covid19ViewerShiny 0.0.0.9000

  • Reference

Create a multiSelection drop list

Source: R/uiFunction.R
multiSelection.Rd

This function can help user to create a drop list.

multiSelection(id, inputDisplay, selection)

Arguments

id

id name of the input, it must be a character
inputDisplay

The name of the selection drop list
selection

A list of character.

Examples

multiSelection("country_select1", "Country:", covid$country)

#> <div class="form-group shiny-input-container">
